about.title: Hi, I'm Oded Wertheimer
about.body: CS graduate from the Hebrew University and a PhD candidate in computational neuroscience. Research background in AI, mathematical modeling and data analysis. I build easy-to-use, adjustable automation platforms. Experience in building BI and digitization process from scratch under constraints, data management/analysis and process automation. A one-person business — fast, precise, outcome-driven.

q1.q: How long does a typical project take?
q1.a: Depends on scope. A simple MVP can be a few weeks; broader transformations take longer. We start with a short discovery and a clear plan.

q2.a: I can do monthly maintenance or handover with clean code and documentation — whatever fits your team.

q3.a: KPIs and tracking are built in from day one: goals, events and dashboards to inform decisions.
